mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), memberId = #{memberId}, boardId = #{boardId}, title = #{title}, `body` = #{body}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, M.name AS writerName, SUM(R.point) AS sumReactionPoint FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id LEFT JOIN reactionPoint AS R ON A.id = R.relId WHERE A.id = #{id} GROUP BY A.id

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article WHERE boardId = #{boardId}
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%') AND `body` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%') AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%') OR `body` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%'))
